Text:
You know, Satanick, instead of posting that keyword list, you could have said much the same thing by simply writing:

A film by Takashi Miike.

It would have saved yourself, and your readers, a great deal of work.

I download this, and the player said "Codec aquired" but didn't get any picture, just the sound.

That happens to me a lot, what codex or codec file do I need to install??

It claims the texted language is English, but there are no subtitles. Can download a subrip (.srt) file here: http://subtitles.images.o2.cz/d/149329/Visitor+Q.html

Also, as is customary for Japanese films, genitals are pixelated.
Japanese genitals are pricks elated? Really?

jgabriel : I konw this but most people don't

wave54 : sorry for the missing sub
I agree with you awantagy Also it is edited
I love Takashi Miike, i have four of his other movies, i hope this is good!
